Ok it's not the Jidai or Hattori DLC's that are causing the crash, The problem lies within the DLC4free.pack file. If you don't use it, you can use the unit's and not crash, though you can only recruit them by the clan that's meant to have them, if you want to be able to recruit all the unit's I'd suggest this http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?t=473255
